boardgame.name: Dice Throne: Season Two – Battle Chest
boardgame.description: The Battle Chest contains all 4 sets from Season Two._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dice Throne is a game of intriguing dice, tactical card play, powerful heroes, and unique abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It's a fast-paced 2-6 player combat game (1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 2v2v2, or free-for-all). Select from a variety of heroes that play and feel completely distinct from one another. Attack opponents and activate abilities by rolling your hero's unique set of five dice. Accumulate combat points and spend them on cards that have a large range of effects, such as granting permanent hero upgrades, applying status effects, and manipulating dice directly (yours, your teammate's, or even your opponent's)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dice Throne: Season Two introduces a roster of new heroes and intriguing new matchups._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

listing.notes: Kickstarter Edition Dice Throne: Season Two (Champion Edition) All completed Funding Quests incl. Battle Chest Box (NO card sleeves or playmats included) Images are SAMPLES (the game itself is for sure - shrinkwrapped and new).
This posting is for whitmn71 - New Kickstarter season 2 Champion edition battle box with Comic book Issue 1.

Shrinkwrapped, brand new - shipped in the original box. Just got it from the kickstarter but have to sell it because of moving. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s season pass (champion) reward upgraded to the premium battle chest box which means all the season two heroes are in their custom Game Trayz in the Battle Chest Storage Box, also includes Season 1.

Opened and punched. Unplayed. This is the huge battlechest edition (came with promo card pack, comic, and big ass box). I did open the promo card pack to verify everything was there (season 1 promos, season 2 promos, and randomizers). Shipping will be precise. While big, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not super heavy. I would estimate shipping at $10 for east coast, and $20 for west.

New in shrink. Includes Kickstarter bonuses (2018 promo card pack and comic book). The box cover has a very minor wrinkle/crease in one corner, which is hardly noticeable, but I still want to disclose it for anyone who is extremely particular about the box condition. Free shipping within contiguous US (I will use the cheapest shipping option available to me, which to most locations will be UPS Ground).
Won in auction by user Peterslax2 KS copy of Dice Throne: Season 2 in Battle Chest - Includes KS promo cards - Includes KS comic book - Includes Retail copy of Season 1
Season two Battle Chest with all 8 champions. In-hand, ready to ship!

Kickstarter Season Pass incl. 8 characters 1 comic 1 nice looking storage box for all 8 characters played only one time with one duel box. My wife don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t like it :( payment via bank transfer will also be fine.
Playmat for dice throne. Includes season 1, vampire lord, season 2 playmats. Shipping will be $15 flat in the continental US.

THIS IS FOR THE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;LEGENDARY COLLECTOR_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; PLEDGE ITEMS IN STOCK, READY FOR SHIPMENT TO YOU! Legendary Collector - Get this if you are looking for everything Dice Throne: all the Season 1 and Season 2 stuff! Dice Throne Season 1 in all its addictive awesomeness features 6 heroes: Barbarian, Pyromancer, Shadow Thief, Paladin, Monk, and Moon Elf. This is the Champion Edition of Season 1. Dice Throne Season 2 battle chest includes ALL 8 Season Two heroes! This version features the Champion Edition swirl dice that you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find in the Retail Edition. Also included are the Card Sleeve Bundles for Season 1 and 2: 50 custom card sleeves for each of your 14 Season 1 and Season 2 heroes, featuring unique hero art on each set. 700 sleeves total! Last but not least, 3 large 28_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 14.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; neoprene playmats (the 3 playmats included are Season 1 roster + Season 2 roster + minimalist ). Also included are the Dice Throne Season 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Season 2 Promo Card Pack, and the Dice Throne Comic Books Issue 0 and 1. The Battle Chest is a custom Dice Throne storage solution. Holds the 8 unique heroes from Season Two in their custom GameTrayz. Thick reenforced walls. Laminated for protection. Matte with raised UV finish. Minimalist design.
